body.name: Feather Plier Hair Razor with Folding Handle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 44 mins
features: Designed For Professionals; Lightweight With Impeccable Balance; Handle Design And Weight Supports A Professional Hair Cutting Tool That Allows The Blade To Glide Through The Hair Effortlessly; Enables Pure Haircutting Freedom For Cutting Or Shaping
Japanese Stainless Steel Body And Folding Silicon Resin Handle; Enables Complete Autonomy In Razor Hair Cutting And Resists Heat And Other Impurities; Most Hygienic Material Available
Removable Plastic Comb Guard; Advanced Replacement Blade Hairstyling Razor Without A Guard To Support The Most Experienced Razor Cutters Freedom And Prerogative; Removable Plastic Comb Guard Included

Simple Blade Replacements; The Blade Design Of The Plier Locks Into The Handle And Acts As One Piece To Give A High Quality Feel And Performance; This Handle Pairs With Feather Plier Blade Cartridges For Easy Blade Replacement And Disposal
Specifications; Black Handle Is Seven Point Five Inches; Stainless Steel Body Is Five Point Twenty Three Inches; Weighs Point Ninety Five Ounces; Compatible With All Artist Club Razor Blades
body.description: Professional Hair Straight Razor with Folding Handle & Stainless Steel Body Replaceable Blade Razor- Includes Removable Comb Guard The Feather Plier Razor is an advanced replacement blade hair styling, guard-less razor for professional hair cutting featuring a silicon resin handle and a stainless steel body. The Plier is a thin, lightweight hair straight razor with immaculate balance for the artist who craves freedom and is already comfortable with razor haircutting. The razor can be disinfected by either boiling or using ethanol. The razor head can easily be dismantled and cleaned from the inside by rinsing water directly on the mechanism. Do not use "sodium hypochlorite" for disinfecting. Recommended for professional beauty and barber use only.

productInformation.value: #96,401 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #312 in Men's Razor Blade Cartridges

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Feather Plier Hair Razor for Hair Cutting Specifications: Black Handle-7.5 inches (128mm) Stainless Steel Body- 5.23 inches (133mm) Weighs 0.95 ounces (30g) Replacing Blades Simply pinch the razor head and the blade will drop out. Changing the blade is fast and easy. Use caution when to insert a blade, push the lever of the cartridge forward to release a new blade, then pull back to expose it for removal from the cartridge. Carefully pull the blade out, keeping fingers away from the blade edge. Align the front tip of the razor at the end of a new blade, with arrows pointing toward the razor. Carefully slide the blade into the razor, and then press it into place using a hard surface, or the top of the cartridge.blades. Please use feather artist club blades for replacing blades. Professional Hair Straight Razor with Folding Handle & Stainless Steel Body Replaceable Blade Razor- Includes Removable Comb Guard The Feather Plier Razor is an advanced replacement blade hair styling, guard-less razor for professional hair cutting featuring a silicon resin handle and a stainless steel body. The Plier is a thin, lightweight hair straight razor with immaculate balance for the artist who craves freedom and is already comfortable with razor haircutting. The razor can be disinfected by either boiling or using ethanol. The razor head can easily be dismantled and cleaned from the inside by rinsing water directly on the mechanism. Do not use "sodium hypochlorite" for disinfecting. Recommended for professional beauty and barber use only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Sturdy and easy to hold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Original straight edge
reviews.reviewText: I'm so glad i did some research before buying Nick Arrojos straight edge. If you want to pay for his name great do that. If not this is the original cut throat razor. If you watch his earlier videos this is the blade he uses. Then to increase his profits he slapped his name on it and changed the color. His feels cheaper. This one is solid. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than anything before it
reviews.reviewText: Great product.. super sharp.. for me, I wish that the blade was a little shorter because I feel like I could be more precise in shaping up my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't come with a guard
reviews.reviewText: The description says it comes with a removable guard but mine doesn't have one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I expected!
reviews.reviewText: Taking my haircutting game up a notch. This was THE razor to have and I am pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If it wasn't for the quality of the Feather blades that are used with this I would have returned it. The quality is absolutely terrible. The material is cheap, like flimsy cheap, it could have been a prize for tickets at a kids pizza party restaurant with a rat mascot cheap. I can't believe this was over $50.I have another razor that takes cheaper blades that was much cheaper. But the replacement blades for that model absolutely suck and catch your skin. Again, the Feather blades are the only reason I kept this thing, so disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No razor just handle.
reviews.reviewText: Be aware this does not come with razors. You will have to buy separately which is irritating because they do not make that clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
